name: Purgatory (itch) (Sean Davis)
description:
Somewhere between life and death. There's only one way to go and that's up.

Try to escape the flow of lava and see how far you can get before it catches up.

Switch up your color to stand on a platform of the opposite, otherwise you'll fall right through

CONTROLS

A/D - Move

Space (on platform) - Jump

Space (in air) - Change player color

 

     

Go for new high scores to unlock new characters and lava. There's over 15 unlockable character and lava options. (each!) Match the character to their specific lava or mix it up for endless possibilities!

Are scores and unlocks saved?

Yes! You'll see a save icon pop up whenever you beat your score or unlock something new!

Can  I reset my progress?

Yes,  just check the Options menu!

If I donate, where does that money go? 

Any donations will go into to helping me fund future projects! 

Where can I find you and any other games you've developed?

For more about myself, development updates, and game announcements follow me on Twitter.  Also, be sure to check out my other games right here on Itch as well!
